job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using and improving existing AI systems for customer support rather than developing or engineering AI models from scratch. While it involves AI, it leans towards application support and feedback rather than core AI development or engineering.

phrases: improving the AI system
participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'improving the AI system', 'AI model fine-tuning sessions', and 'Prototype and test new AI tools' indicate involvement in the adaptation or enhancement of AI models, which falls under the modeling category, albeit at a higher level than core model development.

phrases: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities' suggests the application and integration of AI into a support system, which can involve software development aspects to connect these components.

phrases: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
Review AI-generated solutions
deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need to understand customer issues, evaluate AI performance in a business context, and ensure the delivery of effective customer support, aligning with business understanding.

phrases: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
close the gap by improving the AI system
Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
ramp up one several products within the first month
Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities
unblocking yourself
soft_skills.justification: The description emphasizes analyzing complex issues, improving systems, rapid onboarding, self-sufficiency, and integrating different capabilities, all of which point to strong problem-solving and pragmatic skills.

phrases: ramp up one several products within the first month
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
soft_skills.justification: The expectation of rapid product onboarding and the continuous prototyping of new AI tools indicates a need for quick learning and adaptability.

phrases: improving the AI system
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
unblocking yourself
soft_skills.justification: The role involves actively improving AI systems, experimenting with new tools, and requiring self-sufficiency, suggesting a need for initiative and ownership.
